channel.title: News on Dr. Yu Feng
channel.description: Recent content in News on Dr. Yu Feng

item.title: Funding received from DAAD PPP with University of Glasgow
item.description: A real-world data-driven simulator for interaction-aware autonomous driving benchmarking, funded by DAAD Programmes for Project-Related Personal Exchange (PPP) with Scotland.

item.title: Journal paper accepted by CaGIS
item.description: Wang, S., Liu, B., Feng, Y., & Meng, L. (2024). Mixed reality-based coordinate system for enhancing survey knowledge acquisition: a study on allocentric and egocentric perspectives. Cartography and Geographic Information Science, 1-21.

item.title: Journal paper accepted by ISPRS J. of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing
item.description: Feng, Y., Xu, Y., Xia, Y., Brenner, C., & Sester, M. (2024). Gap completion in point cloud scene occluded by vehicles using SGC-Net. ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing, 215, 331-350.
